com.percussion.services.assembly.jexl
Class PSSessionUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.extension.PSJexlUtilBase
      com.percussion.services.assembly.jexl.PSSessionUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSExtension, IPSJexlExpression
public class PSSessionUtils
extends PSJexlUtilBase

This is a collection of session utilities required for accessing the server through "front-door" requests. These are requests that need authentication to pass the security filter.

Author:
dougrand

Method Detail

getPSSessionID

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Get the session id. The session id can be passed back into Rhythmyx when calling a Rhythmyx application or other URL via HTTP. Put the session id into the URL as a parameter called PSSESSIONID.",

getJSessionID

               params={})
